exceptions.exn: In environment d : nat Unable to unify "nat" with "mon d".

In environment H : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> Prop, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m d : nat a, b : mon d Unable to unify "mult_mon d b a" with "mult_mon d a b".

exceptions.tactic: intros d' n m IH a.
intros d' n m IH a'.

original: intros d. apply mon_ind. - simpl. reflexivity. - intros d' n m IH a. symmetry. apply mon_sind. + simpl. symmetry. apply IH. + intros d'' n' m' IH'. simpl. rewrite IH'. reflexivity.
